gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 128, Knicks 124
gameRecap.excerpt: Led by Kyrie Irvings season-high 44 points, the Mavericks defeated the Knicks, 128-124. Irving added a season-high tying 10 assists and six 3PM, while Tim Hardaway Jr. notched 32 points, four assists and six 3PM for the Mavericks in the victory. Julius Randle (32 points, six rebounds, five assists) and Jalen Brunson (30 points, eight assists) combined for 62 points for the Knicks in the losing effort. The Mavericks improve to 23-16 on the season, while the Knicks snap a five-game winning streak as they fall to 22-16.
